title: I don't get the Kayn/Rengar/Irelia/Fiora/Kassadin buffs.
body:
All those champions were doing fine, if not great and they get buffed for no reason. And in the same patch Wukong gets nerfed for the same thing they do, only worse. I don't understand the reasoning behind it. Kayn running with the speed of light one shotting everyone with WQAA, rengar too, irelia/fiora are so hard to lane against as another melee, and kassadin got like 5 buffs in a row, don't understand why. You can't catch him and has insane dmg.
No bias though.

I dont know why you think kayn's strong, the champion does literally nothing in the first ten minutes of the game accept pray to sneak kills away from laners. His ganks while, are alright, lack hard cc and he doesnt do any damage on his own. The dude doesnt have a passive, his ult rank one doesn't do that much damage, and he usually puts 2 extra points in his Q for clear speed despite W being the actual damage dealer. His winrate isn't terrible, but he IS sitting at 35th highest winrate jungler on champion.gg, so a slight love tap of a buff will not end the fuckin game. a lot of these champ's are kinda similar, they're fun flashy champions that have only been okay for a long time. Irelia's a fun champ to watch and play, and has SOME counterplay. Fiora's been bleh for a while, rengar can get fucked, and kassadin as previously stated does absolutely nothing pre 15 minutes.

Once kayn becomes tank kayn it fricken sucks to fight against and between wall running , his knockups, and his ult, he has very little counterplay, even often as champs that should counter tanks or assassins.
Kayn becomes a fighter(Red) or an assassin(Blue) but not a tank. You can build either one tanky if you want but it doesn't make him one of the tank class.

Red kayn is literally a mobile assassin/fighter/ tank hybrid. He gets a sizable aoe knockup, tank-like buff in his ult by healing a crap to, and can build tankier or more like a fighter rather than pure damage because he also does %hp damage. If blue Kayne builds tanky he will be pure trash. If red Kayne builds pure damage he will, in many cases, also be trash.

I have to emphatically disagree. Red's healing scales with his AD. Because he has in-built healing, resistances are also good on him. Blue's healing also scales with his AD. Because he does not have an excess of healing, and deals burst damage and his primary targets deal a lot of damage, a larger health pool benefits him better than resistances do.

LC$
Even Phreak said in his patch breakdown that a lot of the buffs were completely unnecessary for their champions.

Rengar: They nerfed 2 of Rengar's items (Duskblade and Stormrazor) by giving him 20/10/0 off his ult CD. How is this such a big deal? It makes it easier to effectively put pressure on the map because his only real way of ganking is either walk through brushes to lane gank (side lanes) or have ult.
Kayn: Blue Kayn was garbage. Red Kayn is basically ALWAYS better they buffed him by making his E go faster and last slightly longer. Buffing his ability to surprise people without also buffing Red Kayn too much while also not touching his damage numbers.
Irelia: Sell skins. Placebo buff to get people to buy it. 30% extra damage to MINIONS isn't going to do much if anything saying you already 1 shot the backline minions and i'm fairly certain 30% more isn't going to 1 shot melee minions.
Fiora: The only "real" damage buff here. 20%/15%/10%/5%/0% extra damage. On a single auto. Every 13/11/9/7/5 seconds. Keep in mind she maxes this second so the extra damage will really only affect 2/3 items.
Kassadin: The only one i actually agree with being too much. "But his ult only going down by 1/.5/0 second dude its nothing!!" It is his main use of waveclear/mobility/dps. Maybe instead buff his base AD or base damage on another ability early game.
